import React from 'react' import CheckOutSteps from '../components/CheckOutStep'; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const PlaceOrderScreen = (props) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push("/payment") } const toPrice =(num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemPrice = toPrice( cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c)=> a + c.qty * c.price, 0) ) cart.shippingAddress=cart.itemPrice> 100 ? toPrice(0) :toPrice(10); cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.15 * cart.itemPrice); cart.totalPrice = cart.itemPrice + cart.shippingAddress + cart.taxPrice return (

  • Shipping

    Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address:{cart.shippingAddress.address} {cart.shippingAddress.city}{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method:{cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order

      {cart.cartItems?.map(item => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.Qty } X ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price }
      • ))}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${cart.taxPrice}
  • Shipping
    ${cart.shippingAddress}
  • Tax
    ${cart.taxPrice}
  • Order
    ${cart.totalPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
